sn22.110:1.5: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto hoti.
sn22.110:1.6: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto”ti.
